document_data.name: Heal Self
document_data.mainbody: '''''Heal self''''' was a [[spell]] that was first developed by the [[phaerimm]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this powerful spell fully healed the caster. Broken bones and damaged organs were fully restored. The spell also healed illnesses, parasitic infestations, and conditions such as [[lycanthropy]] and [[mummy rot]].
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required several [[material component]]s: a single drop of the caster's blood, two drops of water, and a [[gemstone]] worth at least 100 [[gp]]. During casting, the caster placed the material components in their hand and slapped them to their body.
document_data.History: This spell was originally created by the [[phaerimm]] of [[Myth Drannor]].
